content: Thanks for this, Sara. To keep going while living with mental health challenges is a daily choice, and — as you so rightly point out — it gets fucking exhausting at times. And yet, to give up would mean to give in — this would never be *my* choice but that of Depression, the invisible dog in my head, and the mutt is not in charge, I am! So I shall keep going until life kills me, just as Carrie did, just as you do. Because we mouthy broads are ultimately far stronger than we know. ❤
